Package ai.nettogrof.battlesnake.treesearch

Class AbstractSearch

java.lang.Object
ai.nettogrof.battlesnake.treesearch.AbstractSearch
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractBestFirstSearch
public abstract class AbstractSearch
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
This abstract search class is the based of all search class, provide basic method use in any search.
Version:
Spring 2021
Author:
carl.lajeunesse

    • kill

      protected abstract void kill​(SnakeInfo death, java.util.List<SnakeInfo> all)
      This abstract method will be use to "kill" a snake
      Parameters:
      death - SnakeInfo of the snake to kill
      all - List of all snakeinfo

    • generateChild

      public void generateChild()
      This method is used to generate child node from the root. Mostly used for multithreading

    • checkHeadToHead

      protected void checkHeadToHead​(java.util.List<java.util.ArrayList<SnakeInfo>> moves)
      This method check if there's a head-to-head collision. Shorter snake die, and if both snakes are the same length both dies
      Parameters:
      moves - List of all possible move

    • merge

      protected java.util.List<java.util.ArrayList<SnakeInfo>> merge​(java.util.List<java.util.ArrayList<SnakeInfo>> list, java.util.List<SnakeInfo> snakes)
      This method merge previous snake move (list) , with new snake move
      Parameters:
      list - Previous list
      snakes - New move list
      Returns:
      List of List of move

    • createSnakeInfo

      protected abstract SnakeInfo createSnakeInfo​(SnakeInfo snakeInfo, int newHead, AbstractNode node)
      Create new SnakeInfo based on the current node and the new head square
      Parameters:
      snakeInfo - previous snakeInfo
      newHead - New head square
      node - Previous node
      Returns:
      new SnakeInfo

    • addMove

      protected void addMove​(int newhead, java.util.List<SnakeInfo> allSnakes, SnakeInfo snakeInfo, AbstractNode node, java.util.List<SnakeInfo> listNewSnakeInfo)
      This method add move to the list if the snake can move in the new head position.
      Parameters:
      newhead - New head
      allSnakes - List of all snakes
      snakeInfo - Information about the snake
      node - Parent node
      listNewSnakeInfo - Current list of snakeinfo

    • freeSpace

      Check if the snake can move on the square
      Parameters:
      square - the int sqaure
      allSnakes - List of all snakes
      currentSnake - current Snake
      Returns:
      boolean free to move on that square
